title: The Total Money Makeover
description: A popular book for getting out of debt and building wealth through 'Baby Steps'. Great for beginners.
author: Dave Ramsey

title: Mr. Money Mustache Blog
description: A financial independence blog focusing on extreme saving, early retirement (FIRE), and smart lifestyle choices.

title: Investopedia: Cryptocurrency Explained
description: Comprehensive guide to understanding Bitcoin, Ethereum, and the broader world of digital assets and blockchain technology.

title: Khan Academy: Taxes and Investing
description: Free educational videos and lessons on topics like income tax, capital gains, and basic stock market concepts.

title: You Need A Budget (YNAB)
description: A popular zero-based budgeting software and methodology focused on giving every dollar a job.

title: The Simple Path to Wealth
description: A simple guide to long-term investing, primarily advocating for low-cost index funds.
author: J.L. Collins

title: How Compound Interest Works
description: A video illustrating the power of compounding over time, a core concept in long-term saving.
